pnpm exec nx watch --projects cli --includeDependentProjects -- pnpm exec nx build-deps cli

metadata.description: CLI tool for managing releases in the forge-js monorepo
ESLint plugin monorepo with LLM-optimized rules

metadata.scriptContent: pnpm nx run-many -t build --all && nx release publish
gh workflow run ci.yml --ref local-playground-app && echo ' Workflow triggered!'

commands.command: test -d .husky || (echo ' .husky directory not found. Run: pnpm install' && exit 1)
test -f .husky/commit-msg || (echo ' commit-msg hook not found. Run: pnpm install' && exit 1)
test -x .husky/commit-msg || (echo ' commit-msg hook not executable. Run: chmod +x .husky/*' && exit 1)
test -f commitlint.config.mjs || (echo ' commitlint.config.mjs not found' && exit 1)
git config --get commit.template > /dev/null 2>&1 || git config commit.template .gitmessage
echo 'feat: test message' | npx --no commitlint > /dev/null 2>&1 || (echo ' commitlint not working' && exit 1)
echo 'invalid message' | npx --no commitlint > /dev/null 2>&1 && (echo ' commitlint not rejecting invalid messages' && exit 1) || true
